website_summaries.verdict: It's thick and has some nice features, but there are also some concerns that could affect its looks.
pros: Dense pile that's soft and thick
Stylish pattern is versatile for almost any room
Comes in several sizes and color combinations
cons: Some owners report the pattern is uneven, and there is a crease in the center
Some colors look different in person

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I did not have the discoloration issues everyone mentioned It's way softer than I expected and it's beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Payton soto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome area rug for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new area rug! Used it for the dining room. The grey looks slightly darker in picture & turned out looking a little darker in my pic as well, not ugly like a couple pics down in playroom on other review gray and yellow are softer not harsh like that pic. I have not found any variation in color except for when moving grain of carpet. It has a sewen/stitched edge that is barely a half incheck in the same gray as carpet. I do not feel it needs a slip pad under it at all. I am very happy with the quality of the rug & looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Super low quality.  Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bottom of the barrel, very cheaply made rug. It's super thin and not constructed well. I'm not sure how we will ever get it to lay flat bc of how cheap and thin it is. I can't believe this costs $24...ha what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Paige R.

customer_reviews.title: Awful Rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is very different in person than the picture advertised. If you want a nice soft rug, then don't buy this one. I have attached a picture. The top picture is the real rug. The bottom picture is the one advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ad picture makes it look like a great quality, but it's made pretty cheaply...
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: Nice. But Initially Slippery.
customer_reviews.text: The design and colors (grey and turquoise) were perfect for my kitchen. I have slate grey floors and this does not detract. It was however strangely a bit "Slippery" when I initially placed it. There must be some fabric coating on it. Because after walking and slightly slipping on it, the bottom of my feet on my hardwood hard surfaces was still slippery. But, after foot traffic and my robot vacuum it has lost the slippery-ness.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the crease
customer_reviews.text: The carpet in upon its self is good. The pile is very low, but seriously learn to roll your carpet when packaging it. There is a half inch high crease the width of the carpet due to how they packaged it. After a week its still there, I must say it is receding a bit but still.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL!!!!!!! The corners do take longer than usual to fold down, but the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: JJASCH

customer_reviews.title: This is a great carpet, not flimsy and the colors are very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carpet, not flimsy and the colors are very nice! The yellow is slightly more mustardy than it appears in the picture, but looks very nice. My cats claw it and the bottom during playtime and it is barely affected. We don't wear shoes in the house but a year after having it, there is no fading or discoloration. Very easy to clean if you do spill anything.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design!
customer_reviews.text: The rug warms up the room with a neutral palette and the pop of the blue. We love the design! The gray in the photo is silvery in the lighting in our home and adds a little pizzazz. The pile is quite low so don’t expect a plush area rug. It was nicely wrapped for shipping but is taking a while to flatten out. Nice rug for the price. I can’t yet rate it on durability. Our dogs now like to lay on it so we’ll know soon how it handles hair, staining and cleaning 🐶.
customer_reviews.author: KDickerson

customer_reviews.title: A child must have made this - Zero stars if I could give that
customer_reviews.text: It may be pretty, but it's super crooked. If you're going to put it in the middle of an area where you can't tell how crooked the corners are, fine. But if you want to have it sit flush against a corner, you will be extremely disappointed...it is not a right angle at all. See the picture...I left the rug mat underneath so you can see, my wall isn't crooked, this rug is. I would return it, but I threw away the packaging, so now I'm stuck with a useless rug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: I read previous comments that the rug is not plush or good quality. Mine is great quality. Not as plush as others I bought previously, but it is pretty and the colors are accurate. It matched my furniture perfectly. I loved the packaging. They had little end caps on the rolled up rug to ensure it did not get bent or damaged/frayed. It is holding up to wear, dogs, and vacuuming pretty well. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaffer

customer_reviews.title: Colors are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this rug, but very disappointed with the color. It is MUCH lighter than in the pictures. I wish my pictures would show just how light.
customer_reviews.author: Somethingsomethingdarkside

customer_reviews.title: Uneven thickness
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and colors, but unfortunately I'm in the group with a disparity in color. I think it might be a thickness difference more than anything else. We unrolled and rolled the opposite direction, have used it for a couple of days and vacuumed it. It isn't getting any better. I'm torn on trying to return it or keep it and hope it improves. As you can see, from some angles it looks consistent, but other angles are a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Josh N.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy rug-give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after reading other reviews about discoloration and how thin the rug is. I have been pleasantly surprised by the product. While it is "thin", it's not paper thin and it actually quite comfortable. The "discoloration" seems to be from the tight wrapping of the rug for shipping. After about three days and a few times of vacuuming, this rug looks great! I have kids (and adults) in my house who spill and make messes. I like that this rug is a great price so I am not devastated if they stain it, but also a good quality for the price. So far, I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty rug. No surprise on the colors - the rug looks just like it does in the photos. A little thinner than I was hoping but it is a nice rug for the price. Update 11.07 A giant wrinkle never did come out of this rug. It is not wearing as well as I had hoped but it is in a high traffic area. It has been less 7 months and I am already looking to replace this rug.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Looks like picture, mostly
customer_reviews.text: The writers are a little off, more of a cream than true white, but the pattern is accurate. For what I paid I wish I'd gotten a size up, since it's a bit small for my living room, but the blue is a nice color, and the pattern is pretty. it's not plush, but it's soft enough, and short enough for easy vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Readaholic

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it, don't be a hater
customer_reviews.text: For the money this really excels. I think the people who complained most (colors off, doesn't lie flat) found it more convenient to write a bad review than make any effort. Maybe it's legit and you got a bad rug. However I'm skeptical of even that. Unroll the carpet and roll it the other way. It will lay flat. To be sure I used a little rug tape. And the color (on mine) is extremely consistent, and I got a large one. Vacuum it once. Only smell I got was a new car smell. I'm confident saying the people who complained are the same ones that return their food after eating most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rug for the price. It is easy to vacuum because it's a low pile rug. After several months you can still see some of the faint lines from being ripped/compressed. The only downside is that because it is low pile frequent use areas will become worn and show use. I see this on the area on the rug where I sit on the couch. Not sure it comes through in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: but a cream color that actually makes it look like the rug is completely filthy
customer_reviews.text: this rug is very light colored and the white is not white, but a cream color that actually makes it look like the rug is completely filthy. The gray and yellow are so light, that part looks dirty as well. Overall, I have come to hate this rug in the last 3 weeks I have had it and decided to eat the cost I spent and I just ordered a new rug from somewhere else. It did come very fast though, and so i gave it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great runner for behind my couch
customer_reviews.text: So soft! I found mine to be true to color. Great runner for behind my couch. Can't tell in photo because I didn't lie it up, but the length I chose is the exact length of my couch. Hoping it will hold up to vacuum but it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: lydia bare

customer_reviews.title: Not as vibrant as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This rug isn't a vibrant as the picture online. The gray is very dull/faded and really did not work for me at all. I received this item in the morning and, by that same afternoon, I had returned to my local Kohls.
customer_reviews.author: Fe Brews

customer_reviews.title: Quality Rug
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug - the only problem is that one corner end of the rug rolls up - it creates a tripping hazard. It wasn't packaged very well - I have bought rugs before and they are covered in a cardboard looking cover. The packaging for this rug was plastic wrap - maybe the reason for the roll up on the corner end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, but in the pictures the designs looked raised to me. It looks like different material than I thought it was. It would be great if that were the material I was looking for but it wasn’t so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous rug! Worth every cent! Really adds class to any room and you can tell it’s not cheaply made. We bought this for our kitchen area and it really looks amazing. We have shag rugs in the rest of the house and wanted a rug suited for a lot of foot traffic. This would look great under a dining room table or in a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McBride

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug, kind of thin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rug, kind of thin, but I prefer that. It was delivered folded, rather than rolled which resulted in creases in the rug and super curled edges. I've had mine for several months, and the crease/ridge is still in the middle. I laid heavy books for a few days on the edges to make the curling lie flat and that worked well. The crease, however, will not come out despite all the heavy items I've laid on it to make it lie flat
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they will be easy to clean or stain resistant because I just received them, however, I love the color. I got the grey with the turquoise. The grey is between a light/med, and the turquoise is on the lighter side as well. Looks great with my room
customer_reviews.author: Nana58

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was late, product is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got in yesterday. The tracker had it arriving some time Monday but I got in Tuesday afternoon, the tracker never changed. The rug itself is beautiful, it's still flattening out but I included a photo. Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug in Spite of Frustrating Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a rug online but I am so glad I did. It is absolutely beautiful. It is well made and overall a good value for the money. The gray and yellow are very soft in tone and are neutral enough to mix in with a variety of decor. It was the perfect finishing touch for my living room. My only complaint is how the rug was packaged. The end was folded over in a very uneven line and then it was rolled from there. This caused severe creases that took a few weeks to relax. While that was a pain to deal with, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Exhausted in the Burbs

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to clean it!
customer_reviews.text: The rug is nice, but I thought it was white and gray. It's more cream and gray. I would not purchase it if you are expecting white. I purchased this rug one year ago. I got the 7'10" x 10'2" one for my dining room. After a couple of months a large wrinkle appeared. I could not get it to lay flat. After the first cleaning, there are wrinkles everywhere. I am embarrassed to have it in my home. I will replace as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect for a rental
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I know this rug won't last forever, but it's perfect for a rental. The colors and design are exactly as shown. I haven't had any issues with it moving, so it's nice that I didn't need to buy a rug pad. The colors are fairly light, so I do worry about staining, but that's the name of the game when you choose to decorate with colors like this.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: SKIP IT
customer_reviews.text: Rug is awful, its faded ! It actually looks like it sat out in the sun and faded out. There's dark stripes and faded light strips. I thought it was just the way the carpet was laying so I vacuumed it but that didn't help. Got a refund!
customer_reviews.author: BCharlton

customer_reviews.title: Love! Don't let them scare you! 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price and I ALWAYS read reviews before I purchase and some of them scared me. I read that there were bumps in the rug that wouldn't flatten out. I didn't hvw that problem. I also put my kitchen aid and food processor on either end of the rug after I rolled it out so that it had some weights and would flatten out the end and they now don't curl. This is exactly what we needed! You can't beat the price, and don't be afraid of other reviewers comments!
customer_reviews.author: TheGirlWithADHD

customer_reviews.title: I never expect carpets to last long especially when we have a dog and a baby on the way so this is a good price for the size and
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the baby's nursery. I never expect carpets to last long especially when we have a dog and a baby on the way so this is a good price for the size and purpose. I fully expect it to last longer than 2 years but wouldn't care if we threw it out by then. I vacuumed several times it looks good every time. No loose ends or balls up.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug! Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! It is so pretty! We just moved into our new home and it goes perfectly with the grey cabinetry, white countertops, and our blue over the bar light fixtures. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cheaptrick

customer_reviews.title: 3-3 x 5size
customer_reviews.text: Pretty rug. Too bad it was packaged so poorly that the creases are not coming out. It was folded in a couple of places instead of rolled which caused the carpet's pile to flatten. Makes the carpet buckle and appear to have discoloration. I've been working to bring the pile back up. I hope I can because I really like the rug.
customer_reviews.author: krains

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to tell the quality when ordering online but I was not disappointed! For this price this is a great rug
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about this purchase. It's hard to tell the quality when ordering online but I was not disappointed! For this price this is a great rug! The colors are exactly as they appear. I'm so glad I didn't spent the. $1500 on the rug I was originally going to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel sloan

customer_reviews.title: Rug color NOT as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: The photo is vibrant. The rug is not. I don’t know what happened to the color correction but this isn’t a bad rug, it’s just not the same rug as in the photo. This is pastel, the photo jewel tone.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking & feeling
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made - it looks more like velour than carpet. The binding on one side is barely there and didn't even catch all the rug fibers. My last rug was from Target and looked 100% better but my dog chewed the edge so I needed to replace it. This was the wrong choice, LOL
customer_reviews.author: rda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gray and yellow rug for a new office space. I read a couple of reviews about it being wrinkled, not very thick, etc. Since it was only approximately $60 I wasn't expecting high-dollar quality. However, it is perfect for what I wanted. It does not come packaged wrapped around a cardboard tube so there are some wrinkles. However, I've had mine down for over a week and the wrinkles are already gone. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: TJ71

customer_reviews.title: beautiful for the price
customer_reviews.text: nice rug. considering it is a light color it seems to repel dirt and cleans easily. found two spots where the tufting is a little thin but does not affect the look. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: L. silks

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I want the buyer to beware. The rug puts off an odor, maybe the backing? I could still return it but not worth the hassle. I have to move a queen size bed. If it continues to smell (3 weeks now) it may have to become an outdoor rug. Very disappointed but that's what I get, this is an example of getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love My Rug
customer_reviews.text: I'm sitting here admiring my rug. We have received numerous compliments on it. I especially love the fact that I was able to purchase the matching runner and then the same pattern in a different color for the hall entrance. We have a small place and it tied everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better in person v pics
customer_reviews.text: This rug was the final touch in my laundry room. Perfect size and color and added warmth to the room. Delivered as expected and looks better in person than in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't expecting anything too great due to price but the rug was not square
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting anything too great due to price but the rug was not square. Something happened during manufacturing, the cut was way off, had to return. Received refund but they only refunded to Amazon account instead of original purchase method which I requested. Not happy but it worked out because I found another amazing rug on amazon for not much more money.
customer_reviews.author: sagebaby33

customer_reviews.title: Thinner and coarser than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my master bath and it is thinner than I had hoped and has a harsh feel to it. I was hoping for something a bit softer, heavier, and plusher. Because it was shipped in a tight roll, and is thin, it is hard to get it to lay flat. I have stacked heavy boxes on it to try to get it to lay flat. It looks lice, but does not feel good on your bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Better than i thought...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised in quality, shipping was on time, packaged to protect, very soft and plush, color is lively and rich
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. Don’t buy it. Don’t buy it. Don’t buy it. If you buy it after all these don’t then it’s on you Huge waste of money. After opening it it took us one minute to determine right away that we are returning it this is how bad it was.
customer_reviews.author: Gaith

customer_reviews.title: The Quality and Value Are Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: What a nice complement to our new color scheme the rug is so nice and doesn't pill or anything...it didn't have a harsh smell as some rugs do...it takes to cleaning well...a great bargain that is more than one would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: The Encouraging One

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my living room
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug, works perfectly in my living room. It's turned into my dogs favorite as well. I have now bought two, a 5 x7 and the 8 x 10.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieJo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pattern
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it is soft but the rug is thin. You must have something under it to hold it down otherwise you will be sliping and sliding all over the place. Over all a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yatae

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy! False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: When I order it, I thought the reviews might not be true. When I saw the rug, it looks so badly and very disappointed the color as it looks totally different as compared with the picture seen online. When I place the rug on the floor, I can see the color is discoloring all over and the rug looks awful due to color is faded out. Very disappointed of what I get, I need a refund of this false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Sonic101

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks-as expected Quality-Horrible Durability- Horrible Overall- Doesn’t lay flat around perimeter, not white its cream and dingy looking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality/manufacturing issue?
customer_reviews.text: It arrived much quicker than expected. It's attractive, but since putting it down a week ago all 4 ends have started to curl upward; not sure what that's about. It was worth the sale price, but definitely not worth the full price. I'm really disappointed in the ends curling and it seems the sides are starting to pull upward as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to brighten up the room, price is right
customer_reviews.text: love this rug. I would recommend getting some sort of backing for it if you wanted a "cushion" feel. It is a furry feel but not very thick. Mine is in my photography studio, so it is only for looks and to walk on. (No one is laying on it watching TV) The fur is a short shag so sure not to cause issues when vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lee Photography

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this rug. But the quality after 3 months was horrible. I reached out to amazon and they said contact the seller, that was in January. I still haven’t heard anything. It gets hard after a month and the overall quality is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Erin Apple

customer_reviews.title: color in picture on internet can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: nothing wrong with the rug it's very pretty I had to send it back because the color was wrong it looks like white but it's really a cream ivory color it didn't go with my black and white kitchen
customer_reviews.author: js63

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price !!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I switched out my shag carpet that was too hard to clean for this i am shocked about how great it is for the price! The pics were taken right after being layed down so it’s still rolled on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Aeckenrode

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture not as thick as I had hoped but still a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: These look great in my hallway.
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful color that bring out the blue of my hallway. I bought two. they fit nicely in the hallway, which cannot take a long runner due to the furnace uptake grill. I love the design and the material.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rug but still Wrinkled.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really pretty rug and I love it, but for some reason after a week of weighing it down the rug is still rumpled. I can't get it to unfurl any tips?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lay flat but great colors
customer_reviews.text: The color is great but the wrinkles won't come out. Been on the floor for two weeks and it is still rippled. Maybe I will try to stuff it in my dryer and heat it some to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: dredaker

customer_reviews.title: Rug is beautiful- despite a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall rug is nice. Packaging needs improvement as my rug arrived extremely dirty. The colors are very deceiving. The gray is extremely light, but the blue is beautiful. I would have sent the rug back but the day it arrived it was due to go on the moving truck for our move out of state. The quality and softness are good for the price. I would purchase again though - as long as packaging was better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived partially wrapped in plastic and dirty. 10” x 12” smudged with what appeared to be grease/dirt. The rest of the carpet was clean and unaffected. After scrubbing for approximately 15 minutes I was able to get out the majority of dirt and discoloration. Although now that portion has a different texture due to scrubbing. Don’t feel like I should have to clean something (besides clothes) when I bought it new.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Pattern if my husband liked it it is nice. Only problem is that you need to put something under it to stay stationary. other than than perfect for dogs and human feet.
customer_reviews.author: An honest consumer.

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. Great value. Mine was creased like some other people mentioned but it was easy enough to work that out. It lays flat and is lightweight. It is also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AwsmSteph

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug, and it became my inspiration for decorating my home office. I have put in for an exchange, as I want the bigger size. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NMHR

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not exact
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as the picture. The grey is much lighter but still a nice rug for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: The rug is fantastic. It fits in my space perfectly and really pulls together the whole look of the room. I have had it down for a few months now and vacuumed it countless times. I have three dogs and two childen and no stains on my rug. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Excellent Value, Cleans perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS! CLEANS TO SPOTLESS! Have in my kitchen and spills come right up. Perfect and beautiful. EXCELLENT VALUE.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is very attractive, but the quality is poor. The backs are super slippery. Make sure you buy a slip proof mat to attach, or go with a rubber-backed rug.
customer_reviews.author: albinobrunette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It did have some wrinkles, as other reviewers noted, however they came out within a reasonable amount of time. Good quality for the price. With 2 cats and a dog, heavy traffic, teenagers and toddlers; I expect to have to purchase a new rug for that space every year or two. I'd purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: C & C Jean

customer_reviews.title: Looks very cheap. Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pictures, but hated the rug in person. Super cheap looking. The rug is very shiny and plasticy looking in person and so thin you would be able to see through it if it weren't for the fact that he fibers all lay flat. To return it cost almost $20. Wish I had never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: ANW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but very wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty rug, but comes vey wrinkled. We had heavy furniture on it for 48 hrs and it helped a bit, but still not happy with it. If it ever lays flat....id up my rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NIce Accent Rug
customer_reviews.text: Great Value. Perfect accent rug. Looks great in my daughter's small living room. The yellow brings a little sunshine color into the room. The rug looks just like the picture advertised.
customer_reviews.author: DVree

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect, quality is good, price is right - and colors exactly as shown on web page. I am thinking of getting 2 more to go by the front and back door. Highly recommended. -Lucy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: STOP!
customer_reviews.text: I rolled out the rug and found it discolored on either side. I tried vacuuming, walking across it in my bare feet a few times and there was no change. The first photo is how it is supposed to look. I ALSO FOUND THE SAME RUG AT TARGETS FOR $62.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This rug is a lot lighter than pictured but the price and size are good. The rug comes rolled very tightly so getting the wrinkles out will take some time. It's soft and serves a function. I have sprayed scotch guard carpet to protect from spills and puppy accidents and it works great! I would recommend for a house with children or pets as it isn't too high pile and doesn't shed!
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I have it in a high traffic area and it just looks so cool and brand-new all the time
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not staying as fresh looking as I’d have liked and it’s not really in a high traffic area.
customer_reviews.author: Je. D.

customer_reviews.title: The dog and the person approve
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice, although as others have said the gray is a lighter shade. It's somewhat soft, kind of like a rug you'd buy from Walmart or Big Lots. It seems to stay in place well so far. The dog approves, as well. I ordered the 5 x 7.
customer_reviews.author: Lunabells179

customer_reviews.title: Looks dingy but the only thing available to match my other decor
customer_reviews.text: Looks dingy, smaller than usual, colors not bold like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Pamela N Andy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is used in my dining room under my dining table. It complements the color of the table well and adds the right amount of color in contrast to the start white walls. Great in this space as my son spills a lot of food on it and it has not stained once!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina von Kriegenbergh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not like the picture. Very dull and white is more cream. Not vibrant. It was rolled and taped on the side that would be visible which left a mark. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Best Rug EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have this under our kitchen table. I wish I would have gone a size bigger for more coverage. The Blue/Grey goes so well together and look amazing on our dark hardwood floors.. Looks exactly like the photo. Lays down like a champ. I have vacuumed it may times... vacuums well. Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 of them, different sizes and colors! I might post photos later. I love them! I hope they are good quality and last a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Durable rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug added the pop of color we needed for our living room. Good quality and we’ve had it for 4 months now and not a problem with it. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and foul chemical odor.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this rug. I ordered it because I really liked the pattern and thought it was reasonably priced. The rug is very poor quality, it is extremely thin and has a horrible chemical odor. I have no idea what to do to get rid of the odor. I won’t order anything else from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: ... yellow is muted and grey slightly darker not a bad thing at all just slightly different than expected - ...
customer_reviews.text: The yellow is muted and grey slightly darker not a bad thing at all just slightly different than expected - product is great- in packaging it was bent in odd way through the middle - I'm hoping it will come out with weighted items on the ridge.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! It's in our Kitchen, looks Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Mae May

customer_reviews.title: Color matches exactly as picture
customer_reviews.text: Redoing my bedroom have not install the carpet yet but it looks very beautiful and color cannot get any other reviews on it yet I hope I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Mine is a little lighter grey in color than the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: Rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. Colors are so pretty. Kinda thin, but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: M & M Rocha

customer_reviews.title: The colors are exactly like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The colors are exactly like the photo. The material is soft and does not shed. The pile is a bit short, so it's not a very plush rug. I'm happy to use it for a while until I find a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Koza

customer_reviews.title: Looks dirty, inaccurate colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not accurate as what is pictured. The bright lemon yellow was more of an egg yolk and the whites looked brownish. The whole rug looks dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is so pretty. It rolled out nicely and within a few hours it’s already flat. Quality is good, it’s not a plush carpet- this is for looks, not laying on We gutted a room recently and this will look amazing with the new floors going in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Arieno

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. Put books on the ends for 24 hours to get the rolls out. Love it, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: hm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous rug! I have it in my kitchen and I love it. Got lots of compliments. It definitely looks moe expensive than it is and very soft of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: rivergirl216

customer_reviews.title: Size was correct
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect in front of my kitchen sink. Colors match my curtains. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: The quality was really bad. he texture of the rug is odd and ...
customer_reviews.text: I only rated it one star to enable me to write a review. It came from the manufacturer with a big black spot on it -- grease or something. The quality was really bad. he texture of the rug is odd and cheap. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

product_meta.title: Moroccan Trellis Contemporary Gray/Yellow 5'3" x 7'3" Indoor Area Rug
product_meta.description: Size:5'3" x 7'3"| Color:Gray/YellowThis beautiful rug is unique, stylish and ready to accent your decor with authentic elegance. This rug features bold colors and modern design. This rug has heavy, dense pile as well as a heavy surface texture. Jute backing, rug pad is recommended to extend the life of the rug and prevent shifting (not included).-perfect gift for father's day. Mother's day, valentines day, Christmas., Brand New, great value area rug. The high-quality polypropylene pile fiber adds durability and longevity to these rugs, the power loomed Construction adds durability to this rug, ensuring it will be a favorite for a long time
feature_bullets: 100% polypropylene machine made area rug with jute backing.
Soft and plush to walk on, the high-quality polypropylene pile fiber adds durability and longevity to these rugs.
Care instructions: vacuum regularly and spot clean; do not dry clean. Rotate periodically stain resistant, fade resistant, no Shedding, easy to vacuum. Rug pad recommended.
These rugs will naturally resist stains, fading, soil and bacteria making them perfect addition to homes with kids and pets.
